sgcool_label_text:These bottles contain beads in hues of dark blue
 light blue
 green
 red
 and white. Embroiderers would unstring the beads and categorise them by placing them into small bottles for use. The original owner of these items made a living fashioning beaded slippers and dresses
 working from home as she did not have a shop.

metadata.physical_appearance: These are bottles containing beads in various shades. The bottles are of varied sizes, and are placed in a curved row.
metadata.subject_terms_1: Peranakan sewing tools tailors beadwork (visual works)
metadata.subject_terms_2: Beads Peranakan (Asian people) Sewing Equipment and supplies Tailors Clothing trade Bead embroidery
metadata.subject_terms_3: Vanishing trade Textile art and design
metadata.sgcool_label_text: These bottles contain beads in hues of dark blue, light blue, green, red, and white. Embroiderers would unstring the beads and categorise them by placing them into small bottles for use. The original owner of these items made a living fashioning beaded slippers and dresses, working from home as she did not have a shop.
